'''1.8.2-pre3''' is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8.2]], released on January 15, 2015, which fixes a bug with passive mobs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150120132547/https://mojang.com/2014/12/minecraft-1-8-2-pre1-christmas-gift-edition/|title=Minecraft 1.8.2-pre4 – Updated Christmas Gift Edition|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.8.2-pre3|prefix=Minecraft
|;previous
|76556|Creepers, blazes, pigs, ocelots, rabbits, and iron golems take damage every 0.5 seconds.
|;hotfix
|76569|Realms: <code>[Client thread/FATAL]: Error executing task</code>.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
